TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {947=The Gateway 21.5" Widescreen LED Backlit (KX2153 Abd) combines exceptional display technology in a sleek space-saving design providing increased productivity and a fun entertainment experience. Sporting a classy all-black appearance, the KX2153 LED Backlit Display features a native 16:9 aspect ratio, 100 Million:1 contrast ratio (ACM) and rapid 8 ms response time for sharp and vibrant picture quality. Its brightness (250 nits) is engineered for use in normal ambient light to deliver optimum brightness during most common usages. The large workspace lets you see more of your web pages, view multiple documents at once and enjoy widescreen High-Definition content.
